Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: kahlilj
Reviews.Content: I have had this tv for almost two years & it has NEVER had any problems. The picture quality is outstanding, the panel is gorgeous & the features are numerous.  I love the PIP capability which is rare in recent tv's & nmot even mentioned in most ads!  I always find it interesting that the PIP feature is not promoted or even included in most "large display" sets, because when you have this much room that is the beauty of it!  If there was one thing I wish the tv had was a VGA (or SVGA) connector for connecting to a computer.

Reviews.Title: Damaged delivery
Reviews.Author: Johnny M. Register
Reviews.Content: I am now on my third order of this model, the first two were delivered with shattered screens, now on the third delivery the TV body is damaged. I can understand that sometimes a product comes from the manufacturer damaged - but three times in a row. Not only that it has been more than a month of trying to get this TV and Amazon can't or want offer any discounts for the trouble I have been through.
